ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Cut potatoes into uniform small cubes for even cooking
Brown sausage slices to add color and flavor before combining with other ingredients
Stir the casserole halfway through baking to ensure even cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through building a convenient casserole by balancing the simplicity of canned soups with homemade potato and sausage quality.
